commit.message: fix(TBD-11038): The distribution AMAZON_EMR with the version APACHE_2_4_0_EMR doesn't exist

nodes.bodyText: I suggest doing a copy of input list to be safe
it's enum, application-level constant. Please remove setter. IMO all variables in enums must be final or, at least, API mustn't allow modifying it outside in any way.
please return copy of the list, to avoid modifications outside of the class
please put it before the constructor you're referring to
if it's possible, please, put variables in this enum before the constructors.
